Now, putting all together in code.

Now, let's code step by step.

First, the main function:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {
    long long a[4];
    for (int i=0; i<4; i++) {
        scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
    }

    // Compute max product
    long long max_val = 0;
    max_val = a[0] * a[2];
    if (a[1] * a[3] > max_val) max_val = a[1] * a[3];
    if (a[0] * a[3] > max_val) max_val = a[0] * a[3];
    if (a[1] * a[2] > max_val) max_val = a[1] * a[2];

    // Convert max_val to string for second step
    char s1[20];
    snprintf(s1, sizeof(s1), "%lld", max_val);

    // Process second step to get score
    int score =0;
    int len = strlen(s1);
    for (int i=0; i < len; i++) {
        char my = (i%2 ==0) ? 'g' : 'p';
        char his = s1[i];
        if (my != his) {
            if (my == 'p') {
                score +=1;
            } else {
                score -=1;
            }
        }
    }

    // Convert score to string for third step
    char s2[20];
    snprintf(s2, sizeof(s2), "%d", score);

    // Process third step to get result
    int counts[256] = {0};
    for (int i=0; s2[i] != '\0'; i++) {
        char c = s2[i];
        counts[(unsigned char)c]++;
    }

    int oddCount =0;
    for (int i=0; i<256; i++) {
        if (counts[i] %2 !=0) {
            oddCount++;
        }
    }

    // Determine output
    if ( (oddCount <=1) || (oddCount %2 !=0) ) {
        printf("First\n");
    } else {
        printf("Second\n");
    }

    return 0;
}
